chunk:
Cremorlab Mineral Treatment Essence (2018 formulation)

Brand: Cremorlab

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water, Rosa Centifolia Flower Water, Niacinamide, Betaine, Glycerin, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Water, PEG/PPG-17/6 Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Butylene Glycol, PVM/MA Decadiene Crosspolymer, Potassium Hydroxide, Adenosine, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Saccharomyces Ferment,

Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Butylene Glycol, PVM/MA Decadiene Crosspolymer, Potassium Hydroxide, Adenosine, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Saccharomyces Ferment, Aspalathus Linearis Extract, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Water, Lilium Candidum Flower Water, Paeonia Albiflora Root Extract, Diospyros Kaki Leaf Extract

Directions: Dispense an adequate amount onto cotton pad and smooth over entire face after toner. Gently smooth over face and neck starting from the inner to outer areas. Pat in to allow full absorption of essence into the skin. To be used morning and night.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
